Experimental DCR docs¶

Python API reference¶

python.generateTemplate Module¶

Attempts to create airmass-matched template images for existing images in an LSST repository.

Classes¶

GenerateTemplate([model_repository, band_name]) Lightweight object with only the minimum needed to generate DCR-matched template exposures.

python.buildDcrModel Module¶

Attempts to create airmass-matched template images for existing images in an LSST repository.

Classes¶

BuildDcrModel([obsids, input_repository, ...]) Class that loads LSST calibrated exposures and produces airmass-matched template images.

The NSF-funded LSST Project Office for construction was established as an operating center under management of the Association of Universities for Research in Astronomy (AURA). The DOE-funded effort to build the LSST camera is managed by the SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory (SLAC).
